resources:
Cumulus TV Cumulus TV MainActivity com.felkertech.cumulustv.activities.CumulusChannelsSetup
Settings
GDRIVE_FILE VERSION
Welcome to CumulusTV "CumulusTV lets you create custom channels that can be played through the Live Channels app. Don't know what to watch? Pick a suggested channel." Use Google Drive You can create a JSON file on Google Drive and have your channels synced across all your devices. How to Sync "-Create Syncable JSON File in Google Drive\n-Create a Channel\n-On your computer the file should show up.\n You can add more channels here.\n-Save the file.\n-Data will automatically sync periodically."
Report Problems You can browse the source code on GitHub and report any issues you find or suggest a feature. Have a problem with the JSON? You can browse the format there. Get Started "After creating channels, go to the Live Channels app. You'll have to make sure your channels are setup. Then, pick the channels you want visible."
@string/settings_about v%1$s\nBackground art by Marcelo Franceschini\nFrench Translations by @mcmjau\n\nThe app is open source and available on GitHub.
Open Live Channels Add Suggested Channel Add New Channel
Sync File with Google Drive Browse Plugins Import from Google Drive Redownload Channel List View Software Licenses Reset Channel Data About Cumulus TV Read XMLTV (Experimental)
More Actions "Create a syncable file" "Save channel info in Google Drive so you can always access it" OK Yes No "Is Live Channels installed? Email felker.tech@gmail.com" Update Cancel Delete Create Done Select Genres @string/manage_add_new Edit Channel Try Again
"Download complete" "Upload complete" "Invalid drive file. Please choose a different file." "Choose Initial Action" "Write cloud data to local" "Write local data to cloud"
"All Channels" "You have no streams" Channel already added %1$s has been added "Here are some suggested channels" "Find a few streams to add" Version %1$s
Your channel data is backed up automatically through Google Drive. "You don't have permission" CumulusTV is not allowed to access your storage, so syncing is disabled. The app will continue to work by itself. View Permissions
Import %1$d Channels? Hold on a sec... Found a null Uri "You're good to go!"
GitHub View Tutorial Visit website pref_dream_text zzzZZZzzz Ticker text STREAM_TO_BE_PLAYED_IN_DAYDREAM Select Channel Daydream was updated successfully
About MLC MLC is an experimental, web-based, leanback, musical experience. Visit Issue Tracker Connect to Google Drive Setup complete. Make sure you enable these channels in the channel list. Please report this error and your JSON file: %1$s Report this error with your JSON file: DatabaseObject is null Error adding: object is undefined The loading screen can\'t seem to open, but the channel is loading. Something\'s wrong. Cannot tune to this channel. You\'re running low on system memory. Things may not work as expected. Your channel must have a number! This plugin doesn\'t support READALL Channel is invalid "Plugin %1$s not installed." Create a syncable file Save channel info in Google Drive so you can always access it Error: DriveId is invalid The deed was done Delete all your channel data? Please wait until Drive Service is active Software Licenses Choose an app Select a plugin to use. Installed Plugins Download More Connection Issue Cannot connect to Google Drive at this moment. "Plugin %1$s not installed" What do you want to do instead? Download app Open in another plugin Uh-oh, something isn\'t working: loadRows has no activity Add Edit Channel Play Sorry, we couldn\'t do that. Edit %1$s metadata Open Cumulus TV Report a playback issue (Sends the Url) Quick Settings Add Channel \"Channel # %1$s\" Suggested Channels Google Drive Sync Manage Settings Download complete Upload complete "http://cumulustv.herokuapp.com" Your channel must have a name Your channel must have a media url Loading data Export M3u Playlist Search results This is not a video stream, interpreting as a website Sync channels In Progress Sync canceled No data found "Scan error %1$d" Streaming Audio No URL found Channel Number Channel Name Logo Url Media Url Splashscreen Url Epg Url Open Stream Link to an M3u Playlist M3u Url Link to M3U Playlist Url is empty Unsupported action Add a reference to %1$s? This will continually be updated. %1$d channels found ~ Close ~ Show All Debug Sort by Number Print Database Currently streaming Help Print System Data About Add new link Data downloaded from Google Drive Data uploaded to Google Drive "Error found: "" Channels have been added."
